org.osmdroid.api

Class Marker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osmdroid.api.Marker

extends Object
    this is only used by the Google Wrapper/3rd party library

      • latitude

        public final double latitude

      • longitude

        public final double longitude

      • title

        public String title
        The title of the marker. If null then marker has no title.

      • snippet

        public String snippet
        Snippet displayed below the title. If null then marker has no snippet.

      • icon

        public int icon
        Resource id of marker. If zero then use default marker.

        Bitmap of marker. If null then use icon.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Marker

        public Marker(double aLatitude,
              double aLongitude)

    • Method Detail

      • title

        public Marker title(String aTitle)
        The title of the marker. If null then marker has no title. This method returns the marker for convenient method chaining.

      • snippet

        public Marker snippet(String aSnippet)
        Snippet displayed below the title. If null then marker has no snippet. This method returns the marker for convenient method chaining.

      • icon

        public Marker icon(int aIcon)
        Resource id of marker. If zero then use default marker. This method returns the marker for convenient method chaining.

      • bitmap

        public Marker bitmap(Bitmap aBitmap)
        Bitmap of marker. If null then use icon. This method returns the marker for convenient method chaining.

      • anchor

        public Marker anchor(Marker.Anchor aAnchor)
        Anchor of marker. Default is Marker.Anchor.BOTTOM_CENTER. This method returns the marker for convenient method chaining.
